name: Pinball Skeleton 3D
description:
Pinball Skeleton 3D offers realistic graphics and a dark atmosphere that takes place in the scary cemetery. Pinball Skeleton 3D features DUO tables and fun animation with cool special FX and sounds.

PINHOLE/PINBALL games developed by Time Marker Mobile feature uniquely designed pinball tables that are not designed as conventional Pinball games. The games  feature fast-paced ball movement with arcade-style gameplay  to keep you playing even if your not a pinball fan. 

FEATURES
*12 flippers
*2nd table located inside the pinball machine
*Cinematic moving camera 
*Realistic black and white graphics
*Dark soundtrack
